name: Retail Eyes
overview:
Launched in the UK in 2003, Retail Eyes is the leading provider of customer experience improvement programs in the UK and Europe. Combining its best in class mystery shopping, customer satisfaction surveys, retail audit and in-store point of sale (PoS) compliance methodologies, Retail Eyes works with over 100 of the UK and Europeâ€™s leading retailers, restaurants and hospitality providers. Its clients include Age UK, Compass Group, Dominoâ€™s Pizza, Dreams, Gala Coral, Intercontinental Hotel Group (IHG), JD Wetherspoon, Ladbrokes, Lloyds Pharmacy, Nandos, QHotels, Sony, Subway, Waterstoneâ€™s and Zara.

Recognized repeatedly for its remarkable growth, Retail Eyes combines cutting-edge technology with an innovative approach to customer experience in eight languages to clients across a variety of sectors.
